data.text: Fantastic hotel in a great location. Spacious room (corner) with everything needed. Friendly welcoming reception staff and birthday gift left in the room. Didn’t get to swim in the pool but it made for a nice setting to drink some fizz. Ample breakfast each morning to get going on. Very relaxing couple of days spent.
data.title: Fantastic hotel in great location

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Legroom

Thank you very much for your comments and your rating. 
Best regards,
Roberto,.
owner_response.author: Roberto Cifuentes

data.text:
This is a fantastic new find. We have been going to Barcelona for years and this is the best place so far that we have stayed in.
Pros: Comfortable and super clean  rooms, fantastic staff (had an Anniversary surprise Cava and cheesecake!), good a/c and heat, strong water pressure (but considerate due to drought), staff!, very clean and secure parking garage, awesome location (close to our anniversary splurge at Disfrutar-got lucky with reservations), did I mention Staff?!
data.title: Clean, Modern, great Staff, central location!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guests 

Realy nicve to hear from you !!!! Best regards, all the best and please come back again !!!
Roberto.
owner_response.author: Roberto Cifuentes

data.text:
Stayed here for 3 nights with my partner for anniversary celebrations - which the hotel provided us a bottle of fizz and cake for free of charge! 

As soon as you walk in to the reception the hotel oozes style and this is reflected in the decor throughout. 

The reception staff were really friendly and couldn’t do enough for you. 

Room was modern, bright and had everything you would need for a comfortable stay. 

Breakfast is fantastic with a range of continental and cooked options, plus cava! 

Roof terrace is a lovely area - pool was off limits due to a drought in Catalonia though.

The area of Eixample is lovely with lots of chic looking restaurants and ample nightlife - and only about a 20 minute walk from La Rambla. 

All in all I would 100% stay at The Corner Hotel Again.
data.title: Perfect

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Customer;

Thank you for all your comments, we really appreciate and I wil share it with all the Hotel Staff.
Best regards , see tyou in the near future,
Robert.
owner_response.author: Roberto Cifuentes

data.text: Corner hotel, great central location, easy access to all things to visit. Cooked breakfast not very hot, the hot plate to keep food hot was lacking in heat. This does not detract from it being a 4/5 star hotel.
data.title: Corner hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guests

Thank you very much for your review, I will personally check the hot area at breakfast service.
Best regards,

Roberto
owner_response.author: Roberto Cifuentes

data.text:
This hotel is a little gem! We stayed 5 nights for a leisure city break and loved every minute. The hotel rooms had everything you needed and the breakfast was super tasty. 
We had an issue with our shower one night and reception arranged for us to use a shower in a neighbouring room whilst being fixed- thoughtful service I’ve not had prior to Covid. 
The area where the hotel is situated is perfect to visit the sites and great bars and restaurants nearby; Romaine opposite is a good value pizza place, Pepa Wine Bar has amazing food and wine and recommend a visit to the Orient Express Cocktail bar.
data.title: A Great Stay!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Helen,

Thank you very much for your rating and comments, they are of great help to us and we attach great importance to them. Luckily for everyone, COVID has already passed, so we took the necessary precautions and the regulations no longer require us to request any documentation.
All the staff at The Corer Hotel send you our warmest regards, we hope to see you again soon.

All the best, take care.
Robert
owner_response.author: Roberto Cifuentes
